text: Hesperisternia harasewychi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pisaniidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== ==External links== * Rosenberg, G.; Moretzsohn, F.; García, E. F. (2009). Gastropoda (Mollusca) of the Gulf of Mexico, Pp. 579–699 in: Felder, D.L. and D.K. Camp (eds.), Gulf of Mexico–Origins, Waters, and Biota. Texas A&M; Press, College Station, Texas Category:Pisaniidae Category:Gastropods described in 1987
title: Hesperisternia harasewychi
